mapper.select: SELECT so.supplier_code, so.website_code, so.websitec_type, so.websitec_name, concat_ws( '-', ( SELECT DISTINCT placename FROM sn_base_address WHERE placecode = pi.province ), ( SELECT DISTINCT placename FROM sn_base_address WHERE placecode = pi.city ), ( SELECT DISTINCT placename FROM sn_base_address WHERE placecode = pi.district ) ) addressdetail FROM base_supplier_outlets so JOIN base_provider_info pi ON pi.provider_code = so.website_code and so.supplier_code = #{supplierCode} and so.status = 'Y' and pi.update_flag = '0'
